name: Monkey Feet
description:
Monkey Feet is a 2D puzzle platformer about a monkey who had his boots stolen. Play as Feets the Monkey and traverse the treacherous cave setting. Find and eat magical bananas to power your abilities and use them to solve puzzles. Reach the end of the cave and defeat the Bowler Hat Monkey to recover your boots!

Controls

A & D = Left & Right

Space = Jump

Left Click = Use powerup

1, 2, 3 - Q & E - Mouse Scroll = Cycle powerups
